리눅스 시스템에서 물리적 메모리 맵을 보여주는 가상파일

이 파일을 통해 커널이 현재 사용 중인 물리적 메모리의 할당 상태를 확인 할 수 있음.

```Plain
00000000-0000ffff : reserved
00010000-0009fbff : System RAM
0009fc00-0009ffff : reserved
000f0000-000fffff : System ROM
00100000-3fffffff : System RAM
01000000-013fffff : Kernel code
01400000-015bffff : Kernel data
3fff0000-3fffffff : ACPI Non-volatile Storage
40000000-40000fff : reserved
...
```

- 실제 내가 사용하는 리눅스를 열어본 결과
    
    ```Plain
    ✘ user@users  ~  cat /proc/iomem
    00000000-00000000 : ARMH0011:00
    00000000-00000000 : ARMH0011:00 ARMH0011:00
    00000000-00000000 : QEMU0002:00
    00000000-00000000 : fw_cfg_mem
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:00
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:01
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:02
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:03
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:04
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:05
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:06
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:07
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:08
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:09
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:0a
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:0b
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:0c
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:0d
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:0e
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:0f
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:10
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:11
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:12
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:13
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:14
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:15
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:16
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:17
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:18
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:19
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:1a
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:1b
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:1c
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:1d
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:1e
    00000000-00000000 : LNRO0005:1f
    00000000-00000000 : PCI Bus 0000:00
    00000000-00000000 : 0000:00:01.0
    00000000-00000000 : 0000:00:01.0
    00000000-00000000 : virtio-pci-modern
    00000000-00000000 : 0000:00:02.0
    00000000-00000000 : virtio-pci-modern
    00000000-00000000 : 0000:00:03.0
    00000000-00000000 : ICH HD audio
    00000000-00000000 : 0000:00:04.0
    00000000-00000000 : xhci-hcd
    00000000-00000000 : 0000:00:05.0
    00000000-00000000 : xhci-hcd
    00000000-00000000 : 0000:00:06.0
    00000000-00000000 : virtio-pci-modern
    00000000-00000000 : 0000:00:07.0
    00000000-00000000 : virtio-pci-modern
    00000000-00000000 : 0000:00:08.0
    00000000-00000000 : virtio-pci-modern
    00000000-00000000 : 0000:00:09.0
    00000000-00000000 : virtio-pci-modern
    00000000-00000000 : 0000:00:01.0
    00000000-00000000 : 0000:00:02.0
    00000000-00000000 : 0000:00:06.0
    00000000-00000000 : 0000:00:07.0
    00000000-00000000 : 0000:00:08.0
    00000000-00000000 : 0000:00:09.0
    00000000-00000000 : PCI ECAM
    00000000-00000000 : System RAM
    00000000-00000000 : Kernel code
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    00000000-00000000 : Kernel data
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    00000000-00000000 : System RAM
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    00000000-00000000 : System RAM
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    00000000-00000000 : System RAM
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    00000000-00000000 : System RAM
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    00000000-00000000 : reserved
    ```
